citeinfo.origin: National Atlas of the United States
citeinfo.title: 2008 Presidential General Election, County Results - Direct Download

pubinfo.publish: National Atlas of the United States

descript.abstract: This data set portrays election results, by counties for 49 States and by election districts for Alaska, for the 2008 Presidential general election. Reported for each county are the popular vote count for the Democratic Party candidate, the Republican Party candidate, and all other votes. Also reported are the percentage of the vote cast for each party?s candidate, based on the total number of valid votes cast. Over votes (ballots which contained votes for more than one candidate) and under votes (ballots which contained votes for no candidate) are not included in the total number of votes reported. For details particular to each State, see the Process Steps.
descript.purpose: These data are intended for geographic display and analysis at the national level, and for large regional areas. The data should be displayed and analyzed at scales appropriate for 1:2,000,000-scale data. The National Atlas of the United States assumes no responsibility for the use of these data.

idinfo.useconst: None. Acknowledgment of the National Atlas of the United States of America would be appreciated in products derived from these data.

cntperp.cntorg: National Atlas of the United States

dataqual.logic: The data set was checked for topological consistency using the ArcInfo command BUILD. No other checks for logical consistency were performed on this data set.
dataqual.complete: This data set includes election information for all 50 States and the District of Columbia. Data completeness generally reflects the source files.

procstep.procdesc: State legislative district boundaries were added to COUNTYP020 for the State of Alaska using AKSLD_LC National Atlas geometry was used where district boundaries were coincident with National Atlas base features. Polygons for Puerto Rico and the U.S. Virgin Islands were deleted. The county boundaries file was modified to include attributes for the Democratic vote, Republican vote, and Other votes. Attributes were also added for the percentage of the vote received by each party, symbology, and total votes. The square miles attribute was deleted, and the file was renamed. Official results for Iowa were viewed online, the Other category was totaled manually. The vote fields were populated. Official results for Louisiana were provided in Excel by the state liaison. The vote fields were populated. Official results for Maine were viewed online, the Other category was totaled manually, and the vote fields were populated. Official results for Montana were provided in Excel by the state liaison. The vote fields were populated. Official results for New Hampshire were viewed online, the Other category was totaled manually, and the vote fields were populated. Official results for Texas were provided in Excel by the state liaison. The vote fields were populated. Official results for Wisconsin were download in pdf format. The Other category was totaled manually, and the vote fields were populated.

Official results for Alabama were printed from the website as a .pdf file, the Other category was totaled manually, and the vote fields were populated. Official results for Arizona were provided in Excel by the state liaison. The vote fields were populated. Official results for Illinois were viewed online, the Other category was totaled manually, and the vote fields were populated. Official results for Kansas were provided in Excel by the state liaison. The vote fields were populated. Official results for Kentucky were viewed online, the Other category was totaled manually, and the vote fields were populated. Official results for Michigan were viewed online, the Other category was totaled manually, and the vote fields were populated. Official results for Missouri were provided in Excel by the state liaison. The vote fields were populated. Kansas City results were combined with Jackson County (the county where Kansas City is located) results to total complete Jackson County results. Official results for Nevada were provided in Excel by the state liaison. The vote fields were populated. Official results for North Carolina were downloaded as an Excel file and processed in Excel to total the Other votes. The vote fields were populated. Official results for North Dakota were provided in Excel by the state liaison. The vote fields were populated. Official results for South Dakota were provided in Excel by the state liaison. The vote fields were populated.

Official results for Califonia were viewed online as a pdf file, the Other category was totaled manually, and the vote fields were populated. Official results for Colorado were provided in an Excel file by the state liaison. The vote fields were populated. Official results for Florida were provided in a text file format by the state liaison. The Other category was totaled manually, and the vote fields were populated. Official results for Hawaii were viewed online, the Other category was totaled Manually, and the vote fields were populated. No separate data are available for Kalawao County, so the vote values were set to -9999. Any votes in Kalawao County are included with the totals for Maui. Official results for Idaho were viewed online, the Other category was totaled manually, and the vote fields were populated. Official results for Indiana were provided in an Excel file by the state liaison. The vote fields were populated. Official results for Minnesota were downloaded from the website as a delimited text file which was imported into Excel and processed to total Other votes. The vote fields were populated. Official results for Mississippi were viewed online, the Other category was totaled manually, and the vote fields were populated. Official results for Nebraska were provided in an Excel file by the state liaison. The vote fields were populated. Official results for New York were provided as a pdf file by the state liaison. The Other category was totaled manually, and the vote fields were populated. Official results for Oklahoma were viewed online as a pdf file and the vote fields were populated. Official results for Pennsylvania were viewed online, the Other category was totaled manually, and the vote fields were populated. Official results for Rhode Island were downloaded and processed in Excel. Results are reported by city/town, so RI_cities was used to assign cities and towns to the appropriate county. Excel was used to total the Other category, and the vote fields were populated. Official results for Utah were provided in an Excel file by the state liaison. The vote fields were populated. Official results for Virginia were viewed online, the Other category was totaled manually, and the vote fields were populated. Official results for Washington were viewed online, the Other category was totaled manually, and the vote fields were populated.

Official results for Arkansas were provided in an Excel file by the state liaison. The vote fields were populated. Official results for Maryland were viewed online, the Other category was totaled manually, and the vote fields were populated. Official results for New Jersey were viewed online, the Other category was totaled manually, and the vote fields were populated. Official results for New Mexico were viewed online, the Other category was totaled manually, and the vote fields were populated. Official results for South Carolina were viewed online, the Other category was totaled manually, and the vote fields were populated. Official results for Tennessee were viewed online, the Other category was totaled manually, and the vote fields were populated. Official results for Vermont were viewed online, the Other category was totaled manually, and the vote fields were populated. Official results for West Virginia were viewed online, the Other category was totaled manually, and the vote fields were populated. Official results for Wyoming were viewed online, the Other category was totaled manually, and the vote fields were populated.

Official results for Alaska were printed from the website as a .pdf file, the Other category was totaled manually, and the vote fields were populated. Official results for Delaware were viewed online, the Other category was totaled manually, and the vote fields were populated. Official results for the District of Columbia were viewed online, the Other category was totaled manually, and the vote fields were populated. Official results for Georgia were viewed online, the Other category was totaled manually, and the vote fields were populated. Official results for Massachusetts were provided in printed form by the office of the Secretary of the Commonwealth. The Other category was totaled manually, and the vote fields were populated. Official results for Connecticut were provided in printed form by the Connecticut Secretary of the State. The Other category was totaled manually, and the vote fields were populated.

For all records with vote counts, the three vote values were summed to get the total number of votes. The vote percentages were calculated for the Democratic, Republican, and all Other parties. For Kalawao County, HI, the percentages were set to -9999. ELECTION was a Dbase IV file. Field names were added to it. Election was then joined to the counties shapefile. A field call symbol was added. For Kalawao County, Hawaii (there are no values for this county)will be symbolized with lightest democratic color. The symbol code was set. This code is used for the Map Maker display.
Official results for Ohio were viewed online, the Other category was totaled manually, and the vote fields were populated.

spdoinfo.indspref: U.S. Department of Commerce, 1987, Codes for the Identification of the States, the District of Columbia and the Outlying areas of the United States, and Associated Areas (FIPS 5-2): Washington, DC, National Institute of Standards and Technology. enttyp.enttypl: Counties and Alaska Election Districts (described by elpo08p020.dbf)
enttyp.enttypd: The second order division of a nation, such as a parish, municipio, judicial division, and independent cities in Maryland, Missouri, Nevada, and Virginia and districts used for elections in Alaska.
enttyp.enttypds: National Atlas of the United States

attr.attrdef: The number of votes received by the Democratic candidate. In States with cross- endorsement, this value may include votes for the same person which were recorded as votes for a different party.

attr.attrdef: The number of votes received by other candidates, including third-party and write-in candidates. This may include invalid votes in States which do not maintain separate records of valid and invalid write-in votes.

attr.attrdef: The percentage of votes received by the Democratic candidate. In States with cross-endorsement, this value may include votes for the same person which were recorded as votes for a different party. Vote percentages have been rounded so for any given county may total slightly more or slightly less than 100 percent.

attr.attrdef: The percentage of votes received by the Republican candidate. In States with cross-endorsement, this value may include votes for the same person which were recorded as votes for a different party. Vote percentages have been rounded so for any given county may total slightly more or slightly less than 100 percent.
attr.attrdefs: National Atlas of the United States

edom.edomvd: Votes are not recorded for the area because there are no permanent residents.
edom.edomvds: National Atlas of the United States

attr.attrdef: The percentage of votes received by other candidates, including third-party and write-in candidates. This may include invalid votes in States which do not maintain separate records of valid and invalid write-in votes. Vote percentages have been rounded so for any given county may total slightly more or slightly less than 100 percent.

edom.edomvd: Votes are not recorded for the area because there are no permanent residents.
